column1: The Pit Room////Okay I am not mad about this place. The brisket was good and moist and the beef ribs were seasoned to perfection. It is a little bit on the pricier side. I think the most surprising thing for me was that there wasn't a line! Every Texas bbq I've been to has a line out the door and 30+ min wait time. This place had barely any wait and was comparable
column3: than some of the places I've had to wait a long time for. They have all the different sauces and side dishes too. If you're you looking for some solid Texas bbq and you don't want to wait
